attributes.action: Publish the complete list of MP's second home living expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition that  a full list be made showing each MP by name only along with  ALL their expenses related to running , furnishing their second homes  ( or alternative accommodation )in London so that we the public can see if we are getting value for money .

We do not require the individuals actual address or the store they purchased items from  just a full & complete list of every individual expense claimed and how that expense was made up if for more than one item.

We require the list be published on the internet and that the address for it be given wide publicity.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
